text: Thomas Pfyl (born January 1, 1987) is a skier from Switzerland. He has a disability. He skied at the 2011 IPC Alpine Skiing World Championships and was the third skier to finish in the standing men's downhill race, Super-G race, and the Super Combined race. ==References== Category:Swiss skiers Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Competitors at the 2018 Winter Paralympics
title: Thomas Pfyl
